1113.content:
London walked urgently along the corridor, pushing open the doors to her private restaurant, a small room tucked away in the bowels of the ship. There was only a single table in the room, just a single seat in front of it, and she sat down as the waiter walked forward, her stomach rumbling loudly as she took her place, reaching for the digital menu, her fingers stabbing instructions almost by themselves. She rubbed her stomach as she thrust the device as the waiting servant, then anxiously settled back to wait for her food.

After what seemed an eternity, but according to the clock was less than five minutes, the first course arrived, two stacks of pancakes topped with fried eggs, buried in syrup. Her eyes widened as the waiter placed it in front of her, a brimming glass of soda next to it. Normally, she’d hate this sort of food, a sugary, greasy mess, but somehow, she had to eat it, and she took a tentative forkful, placing it in her mouth. The instant the batter hit her tastebuds, it was as if someone had thrown a switch, and she started to shovel it inside, stabbing and carving into the towers. Egg and syrup gathered around her mouth as she took deep gulps of the sugary drink, looking up to see the doors open again, more food brought to her table.

This time a cheese soufflé, large enough to fill a plate, with stacks of greasy bacon on either side, a tall milkshake next to it. There was no delay this time, no waiting, and she simply started to dig into the food, spoon in one hand for the soufflé, fork in the other to stab the bacon, splatters of fat running into her shirt unheeded. She gulped and swallowed, barely waiting to taste the food she was glutting herself on, somehow still as hungry as she had been when she entered her restaurant, a gaping void deep inside that she had to fill, no matter what it took. She dropped her spoon into the now-empty dish, then drained the milkshake in one long gulp, finished with a satisfied belch.

More food. Another course. How much had those eager fingers ordered? This time three huge, juicy burgers, loaded with cheese, fried onions, eggs, fries on the side smothered in ketchup, the patties thick with grease. She reached for the first, struggling to get her hand around the massive meal, fat running through her fingers as she stuffed it into her mouth, desperate bites that sent sauce and grease dripping down her chins. In between bites, she reached for the fries, and suddenly noticed a basket of fried chicken next to them, her eyes widening as she methodically grazed on the platter of junk food, steadily gorging her belly, now finally beginning to feel full. A creaking came from the buttons on her shirt, and with a greasy hand she released one of the buttons, stomach pressing out through the gap to form an incipient muffin top.

Still the meal was not over. She’d almost forgotten dessert. Another milkshake, then a second, placed on either side of a pile of cream buns and a jiggling blancmange, with a plate of cupcakes placed between them. The sugar slammed into her tastebuds as she gorged her way through the desserts, then began to take huge spoonfuls of the blancmange, every bite swelling her belly, bringing ever-greater satisfaction to feed her gluttony. A part of her was still protesting, somewhere inside, but as she stuffed the last of the cupcakes into her mouth, she smiled. Finally, she dropped the spoon onto the table, and struggled to her feet.

“Breakfast reservation for nine,” she said, the waiter nodding as she struggled through the door. “Have a second chef on standby.” Rubbing her belly, she said, “I’m going to be visiting this place more often.”
1113.title: London's private onboard restuarant

11133.content:
London waddled down the corridor, her immense belly jiggling without reservation, beyond the means of any clothing to restrain it. As she walked, she reached out to the platters being carried on either side of her, her chubby fingers snatching pastries and bonbons, stuffing them into her chocolate-smeared mouth. Sweat built on her forehead, and she once again considered the idea of simply having her food brought to her, but she wasn’t quite ready to remain permanently bed-bound. Not yet. Stuffing a last eclair into her mouth, she walked into her restaurant, assaulted by the smell of endless quantities of food waiting to be crammed into her belly.

Once, the restaurant had served a hundred people at a time, but now it was dedicated to only one, and a waiter pulled back the massive chair, allowing her to deposit her elephantine rump on the soft, plush cushions, the metal groaning under her weight as she settled into position at her table, her arms resting comfortably on the surface. A dozen chefs were kept constantly at work to satiate her greed, the kitchen now built into the restaurant so that each course could be brought to her as soon as it was ready. She looked up at the clock, a scowl spreading across her face, and the first platter of food was brought to her, a twelve egg omelette laden with bacon, tomatoes and cheese, swimming in her beloved grease. Golden knife and fork in hand, she attached the food, slashing it into huge chunks and stuffing them into her mouth, melted cheese and egg running down her face in her desperate desire to feed. Next to her, a huge chocolate milkshake was placed, a litre-glass, and she took a deep swig before returning to the omelette.

She was barely half-way through when the second course arrived, a pair of huge steaks, fried potatoes on the side, smothered in a thick creamy sauce that made her mouth water. She started to alternate between the two meals, taking a mouthful of each, one after the other, methodically working her way through the feast, barely stopping to breathe, endlessly stuffing her triple-chinned face. A third platter was brought forward as she ate the last of the omelette, a bacon-wrapped meatloaf, with a basket of garlic bread on the side. Her eyes widened with glee as she sliced into the mass of food, taking massive chunks, periodically going back to the steak once again. A hand slid down to her immense thighs, heavy pouches of fat, and she rubbed her sweaty forehead with the other. Two attendants stepped forward with fans, wafting cool air into her face, and another moved to her back, slowly beginning to massage her shoulders.

The steak and the meatloaf were finished almost at once, and with a loud belch, she looked up for the next course, a ten-pound burrito stuffed with ham, eggs, cheese, more bacon. This time she switched from fork to spoon, digging into the greasy mass, only belatedly noticing the tureen of mac and cheese being placed next to her. She shovelled the food into her waiting mouth, endlessly loading her belly with the food she craved, that she demanded, that she needed. A pizza cake followed as she finished the burrito, four deep-dish pepperoni pizzas placed on top of each other, coated in a cheese sauce, and she attacked the meal with endless abandon, draining her third milkshake. All of this was for her, all to feed her greed, her constant need to feed.

Dessert, at last, after an hour of gluttony. A whole Mississippi Mud Cake, a Black Forest Gateaux, a stack of profiteroles, a chocolate sundae, all for her. She switched to a bigger spoon, then attacked the cake with one hand, snatching pastries with the next, filling herself with chocolate, cream and sugar, gesturing for more to be brought forward, a whole cheesecake, pile of doughnuts, and she continued to indulge, the chair creaking and groaning with every bite, her belly pushing itself over her lap as she cleared each plate, one after another, reaching for her fourth milkshake and draining it in a single bite. Finally, she was finished, sitting back on her chair, her eyes dazed, her hands struggling to cradle her belly, a monument to gluttony and greed. A servant raced forward to gently massage her stomach, and she looked up at the chefs, waiting for a moment, and smiled.

“More. More. More.”
11133.title: A year later...

111332.content:
London slowly writhed on her luxurious bed, the frame creaking and groaning under her mountainous bulk, and her greedy eyes snapped open, her tongue licking her plump lips as she smelled the incoming onslaught of food being brought into her bedroom. Instantly, her attendant snapped to attention, moving to the double doors – barely wide enough for her to struggle through – and swinging them open as the procession of waiters made their way forward. London’s hands rubbed her huge, bulging belly, hundreds of pounds of soft, comforting flab weighing her down. Her toes were almost too big to wiggle, her hands already reaching for the rails that would pull her up, an array of soft pillows being placed into position behind her, allowing her to prepare for her breakfast. A huge tray was locked into position above her jiggling rolls of fat, and the first of the platters of food was placed atop it, ready for her gorging session to begin.

Pancakes. Ten stacks, covered in syrup and butter, with a fried egg atop each one. She reached with her fork, shovelling the sugary mass of batter into her mouth, some of the syrup running down her triple chins, spilling onto her sheets. Next to it, a pile of bagels, loaded with cream cheese, smothered in butter, and she snatched for the first of them, cramming it into her mouth, chewing and gasping for breath as she forced the food down. As she worked through the final pair of stacks, a plate of waffles was put in its place, her stomach groaning and moaning as she reached for the new pile of food, spiking them with her fork, shovelling in the syrupy mess.

Another course, bacon rolls, a dozen rashers of bacon for each one, their greasy mass hanging over the sides of the thin patties of bread. She eagerly tore into them, the platter diminishing so rapidly that the waiters struggled to keep up, putting a companion platter of two dozen fried eggs next to them, stacks of buttery toast by their side. Her hands frantically worked through her breakfast, jaws ripping and tearing as she continued to indulge. Then the pastries, dozens of danishes and cinnamon rolls, all smothered in sticky sugar, her hands a mess as she continued to gorge. Her belly was already starting to swell, her flabby, near-useless legs buried in juicy, delicious fat.

She looked up at the mirror on the wall, looked at the huge mountain of flab lying on the bed. She deserved this. All of it. All the food she could eat, and more besides. She had to have more, endlessly more. And it had to be brought to her. A constant procession of food, until she outgrew her bed, outgrew the room, a vast blob that did nothing but eat and sleep. Her stomach undulated as it filled, waves upon waves of fatty, greasy, sugary foods introduced to it. She let out a quiet belch, then reached for the sugary juice by her side, a huge tureen that she poured down her throat before tossing the now empty container away, narrowly missing one of the waiters. Slaves to her endless, eternal hunger.

More food. Combinations now. A string of sausages buried under a mound of scrambled eggs, ketchup in a moat around the side. Two ten-egg omelettes stacked on top of each other, with a pile of bacon on top. She attacked them with a spoon, cramming in the food, barely stopping to taste it any more. That didn’t matter. Her belly had to be full, bigger, wider, firmer. Endlessly growing. Finally, she dropped her spoon on the last, empty plate, and the waiters began to clear away the mess. She looked up at the attendant, who started to wipe the food from her face.

“Bring me my next course. I will eat dessert in bed.”

A few moments later, the doors opened again, four huge cakes brought into her, each a foot high, hundreds of calories a slice, and all of them for her, for her mighty belly, her mindless greed. Somehow she knew that she’d never leave this room again. And she was absolutely fine with that.

“Cream, ma’am?” her attendant said, holding a huge tureen in her hands.

“Duh,” London said, as she began to pour.

London inquired, the agent took a breath, "If you must know they're here for a bit of weight training and...wait....are you London Tipton? The London Tipton?" London slowly nodded her head, the agent squealed in delight, "I'm Anna Day, President of the big women's modeling society and I would like to make you one of my big and beautiful models."

London had failed to pick up on Anna's sudden change in tone, being an extreme ditz and all, "Er, okay! When can I start?"

Anna placed a finger next to her mouth, judging London's stature, "Well, she is rather thin....,but! She does have some kind of curves to her." Anna thought.

Anna placed a hand on London's shoulder, Anne's face was stern, yet London smiled, "Meet me in my office in an hour...and you may need to bring some food with you. Preferably something fried."

Anna walked off, leaving London frozen in excitement, "I can't believe that I'm going to be a model!" She gazed as many of the passengers took photos of the Plus sized women. She became mesmerized the by the beautiful figures of the woman. Entranced almost.

But then something broke London out of her trance, it was...

It was anouther beutiful day on the SS Tipton. Bailey was sitting in her room, looking over her money supply, wich had dwindled greatly. "What am I gonna do?" she asked herself, looking at her incifficiant funds. "Gonna have to get a job." She thought.

She wondered the deck of the Tipton for the next few days, getting more and more desperit for a job as her money dwindled. She just couldn't find anything! Finay, on her 5th day, she found a job. She readily took it, not careing what it was.

1231.content:
Bailey walked into Sweetles, small shop on the deck of the Tipton, ready for her first day of work. Her new boss, Chuck, was there to meet her by the door.

"Hi, I'm Bailey."
"I'm Chuck, and I'm the owner of this place. We are still in the prosses of oppening up today, so I'm a bit busy. Theres a sheet of paper on the counter that should tell you what to do untill I get to you." He said in one long breath. He then turned and went into a room marked MANAGER ONLY.
"Well... That was weird..." Bailey thought. She walked over and grabbed the sheet the manager was talking about. She started to read...


"Hello, new taste tester! This sheet will fill you in on your dutys her at Sweetles. They are:
1) Your main job is to test the quality of each and every dish here at Sweetles. This means that you must eat one (1) serving of each dish. You are paid by how much you eat each day.
2) If you finish with the above job, you are eligible to receave a bonus by eating more. This is because the more you test, the more shure us at Sweetles are that our food is satisfactory.
3) If you finish your main duty, and do not have anything to do, you may help out around the resteraunt, as casheir, or waitress/waiter. For these dutys you will be paid $8 an hour.

Although many food establishments now think the job of taste tester is obsolete and a wast of money, we think it is an important job, neccisary to our establishment.
Thank you for getting a job at Sweetles!

Just as she finished the note, Chuck came out of his office, and approched her.

"Hey Bailey. Sorry bout leaveing in a rush just then. I'm the manager her at Sweetles. Today, were not quite ready to open, so you can just have a look around and go home. You dont have to follow a dress code, cause your just gonna be in the back eating, but I'll need to know your weight so we can get a spair uniform made for you, just in case you ever want to take the regester or somthing." He said cheerfully.
"104." Baily said.
"Alright, I think thats all I need to know. Your now free to look around. The place you'll be working is behind the kitchen, but you dont really have to work there. I dont care if your in the kitchen, or even in the eating area. See ya tomarrow!" Said Chuck with a smile. Then he dissapeared into his office.

Bailey checked out the restaraunt, and then started looking at what kind of stuff she would be eating. The answer was 32 different flavors of ice cream, 10 different flavors of pie, numorouse flavors of donuts, 12 different cakes, and countless different small buns, eclairs, and other assorted paistries. Ther isn't even mentioning all the different candy. There was chocolate of every variety, lollipops, gummy bears,worms, and fish. The list goes on and on.
"How am I gonna eat all this?" Bailey thought. "Well, whatever. At least I have a job. And an easy one too! All A have to do is eat all day long! This is gonna be fun!"

She was in a happy mood as she went back to her room.
1231.title: A taste-tester at a new sweets shop

12311.content:
Bailey walked into her first day of work wanting to make a good impression, and was wearing her favorite jeans, a pink t-shirt, and a large belt. She saw Chuck wipeing a countertop as she walked in.
"Hey Chuck." she said.
"Hey Bailey. Welcome to your first day! Let me get you started."
He led her into the room he had shown her yesterday. Baileys eyed what was on the long metel table that took up most of the room.
On it was 32 large scoops of ice cream, each a different flavor, and each in its own bowl. next to them all were half-sheets of paper.
"This is the first thing you have to test." Chuck said. "Write on the papers if you notice anything wrong with the food your eating, or if you have any ideas to make it better. When your done, press this butten here to call me in. Good luck!"
With that he left and shut the door.

Bailey then started her job. She sat down on a very comphy reclineing chair, and started with the first scoop on the table, the plain vanilla. Then she tried the chocolate. Then strawberry. The flavors started to get more exotic. Rasberry swirl, Double choco chunk, Cookie dough and Mint! They were all so good. She was eating them at a breakneck pace. But Bailey hadn't realized how much ice cream 32 scoops was. It didnt look like all that much in there seperite bowls. But around her 8th scoop (Choco-Caramel Swirl) she began to feel full. After her 12th, (Neopoloten Nut) she began to slow down. On her 17th, she felt a belly-ache comeing on. Her 25th made her feel little sick. But she kept on eating, ignoring her belly ache. When she finaly finished her last flavor (Called the Super Swirl, was butterscotch, chocolate, caramel, and vanilla, mixed with fudge chunks) she layed back in her chair and let out a breath. "Ug, never thought a tast testing job would be this difficult..." Then she noticed that her flat belly had a small buldge in it. It was basecly nothing, but it wasn't there before. She poked it, and it smushed in, but earned her a sharp twinge from her gut. Her stomach, not used to eating so much at one time, started to growl and complain. Then, she remembered what Chuck had told her, and pushed the button.
In a minuet, he came in to see Bailey sitting in her chair, looking at her tiny belly.
"Bailey! You are already done? It's hasn't even been 10 minuets yet!" He said. Noticeing small small buldge in her gut and her slightly pained expression, he said, "Be right back."

He returned with a few pills, and he handed them to Bailey, saying, "Here, take these." She did, and right away, her belly ache faded untill it was barly noticable. "What were those?"
"Oh, just some pills for your stomach. It worked, right?" he said. She nodded. "Can barly feel anything." She said. "Now, Bailey, you have all day to complete everything, you dont have to ruch through it. In fact, we want you to taste everything, and report anything wrong or improveable. You can do that if you eat 32 scoops of ice cream in less than 10 minuets. You also wont be able to keep eating, wich is a pretty important thing on this job." He said, patting her belly and chuckling. Bailey laughed along with him. "Remember," he said, walking out the door. "you got all day to eat, so dont rush it." Then he left, leaveing a bottle of the stomach pills for her use. (They wore off every hour) Then, 10 slices of pie appeared, the table oppening up to bring them out. "What the?!?" Bailey exclamed. But she shrugged it off, and slowly started eating her first slice of pie.

The rest of the day was spent lazeing around in the soft chair and eating. She only got up once the whole day, and that was to go to the bathroom. Chuck provided for her every need. Once, as she was nearing the end of the donuts (10/11 flavors) she got thirsty, and she pressed the botton. She told chuck to get her somthing to drink, and he brought her a whole 2 liter of Mountan Dew. Needles to say, she drank the whole thing.

Of cource, she went through a lot of pills. Nearing the end of the day, (She was working her was slowly through some eclairs.) she ran out, and Chuck said he had no more, she'd have to wait for tomarrow. Then, slowly, her stomach began to hurt more. By the end of the day, it was hurting quite badly, though luckily for her, her stomach had stretched out through the day, makeing it hurt less. She had become accustomed to the sounds of her stomach gurgleing and groning, digesting all the food as fast as possible.

Now, as the pills wore off, and she began to feel her stomachs pain again, she looked down at it for the first time scence the morning. She haden't thought about it much, because she couldn't feel anything, and had no need to move around. She had just spent all day luxuriously snacking and munching on sweet confections. But now that she did look at it, she was stunned.

It was very big, about the size of a small mellon, and was almost sherical, sagging a bit under its own weight. It pushed out her tight pink shirt, wich rode up a bit to show the bottom of her belly. It hurt quite a bit now, and was still digesting. Her belt was squeezing it painfully, and so she undid it and her button, letting it swell out a little more, and releaveing some pain. She grabbed onto it and shook it a little, and found it was kind of soft, but still firm, and she could her the food moveing around in it. She stood up, winced a little at how it hurt, and found it was heavy and hard to walk with.
She yelled bye to chuck through her wall (his office was right next to her) and went out the back way, not wanting anyone to see her like this. She didnt encounter anyone on the way back to her room.

Though it was only 5 o clock, she flopped in bed. laying on her side. Right before she went to sleep, she thought back on her suprise filled day, and concluded that, even though she was kind of frightend at her current state, she had the best job in the world.

She had spent all of the days the same as the first, lazeing around and eating all day long. The only difference was that the job had gotten even easyer as time wore on. what now?

wakes up, and noteses her now bigger belly!
12311111122121.content:
Bailey quickly got up, and slipped into her loose sweats and a loose shirt. She had to go stuff herself silly to get ready for the contest!

Going unnoticed to her was her belly... She had always had an excelent metabolism, but 2 weeks of constant eating had weakend it, and her stomach now had a pauch of fat on it! She didn't notice it, it was still to small, but that would soon change...

*2 hours later*

"Hey, could you *Burp* get me 2 more shakes and a mega meaty please?" Bailey asked. "Uhh.. Shure..." The worker replied uncertainly, looking at the mass of shake cups and burger wrappers surrounding Bailey.

She got the food, and began sipping on a shake. Then took a bite out of the burger. This continued till it had all gone into her belly.

*Burp!* "Ug, I dont know how much more I can eat..." She said. She had absolutely stuffed herself the past 2 hours, causeing her belly to bloat up alot. "But... I need to win that contest..." After a few minuets of rubbing her belly, she ordered anouther 5 burgurs and a shake, and continued eating.

*Later that night*

Bailey layed in bed, rubbing her painfull belly, now the size of a basketball, and filled to the brim. "Unnng..... Really shouldn't have eaten that 4th 10-scoop sundea... or drank that 2-liter after it... *Belch* Uhhhhg....." She lay in bed, burping, moaning, untill she finaly fell asleep.
12311111122121.title: Training!

123111111221211.content:
The first thing that happend when Bailey woke up, was her stomach growled. She was starveing!

She got up, and noticed that it was almost time for the contest! "Crap!" She said, and she rushed out of the door wearing the same loose cloths from yesterday.

As she rushed to the spot where the contest was to take place, she was very aware of how hungry she was. "Well, the training worked." She said. When she got there, she was out of breath, and they were just getting started. She signed up, and sat down at the long table that was packed with the food that she had been eating for work the past 2 weeks.

"Welcome, one and all, to the 1st ever Sweetles eating contest! We would like to thank you all for being here. But now, lets cut to the chase! You will get half a hour to eat all you can! On your marks... Get set.... Eat!"

With that, everyone, includeing Bailey, Started chowing down. They were mainly fat people, with a few teen guys. Bailey seemed to be the only thin (sorta) girl there. But that didn't stop her. In fact, it made her eat faster. She first dug in on a large cake that was in front of her, than a whole pie, then a few donuts, then a gallon of ice cream. Now she was starting to slow down but she still had 15 minuets! So she kept eating. At the 10 minute mark, she reached for her secret weapon. The Chocolate Drink mix. Nobody had really touched the many 3-gallon jugs that were strewn about on the table, but she would. She got the nearest one, and started chugging it down as if her life depended on it. Her full belly started swelling visibly with each swallow. When she finished it, she didn't know if she could do anouther. Her belly was huge and aching. But when she started to rub it, it was still soft, indicateing she still had room. So she grabbed anouther jug and chugged, her stomach again growing.

She finished it, dropped the jug, and cluched her belly with both hands. She had never eaten this much in such a short time! Her gut was larger than it was yesterday, and when she moved she could feel all the liquid sloshing around. She layed back in her chair, gave a belch, and moaned. "Uhhhg. So full..." She could hear similer complaints comeing from around the table. Then, the annnouncer said, "Times up! Now we will count the amount of food consumed and announce the winner..."

After a few minuets of counting, he came back on and said, "And the winner is... Bailey Picket!" There was a bit of aplause, and Bailey gave a shout of excitement that turned into a burp. Then, the announcer went down to her and gave her the $100. Stomach pills were passed around, and Bailey took 5. She got up and found it hard to walk, but she needed to get to those earings before London did!
So she walked tward the store slowly, with her belly createing a bulge in her loose shirt.

She tries to change into some jeans.

London noticed her, and walked over quickly, saying, "Oh hi Bailey! Just the person I wanted to see!" She then looked at Baileys bulgeing middle, and said, "Gosh Bailey, you gotta stay away from those burgers."
"I'm not fat, just full!" Bailey said angrily. "And I think you would like to know that those earings-" But London cut her off. "Anyway Bailey, I saw these in the store and HAD to get them for you!" "It's your birthday, silly!"
"... No its not..."

"No wait! I forgot! It is my birthday."
"Oh. Well, enjoy!"
Then London walked away. "Well... That was weird... And now, what am I going to do with all this extra money?"

Then Bailey, Feeling very full, went to her room to sleep off some calories.

What happens when she wakes up?

When Bailey wakes up, It is 4:00pm. She throws off the covers, and hops out of bed. Still half alsleep, she stripped down, put on a tight shirt, and grabs some tight jeans. She pulls them up with some difficulty due to her drowlynes, but then all remnates of sleep flee when she looks down to do the button.

"AH! What the heck?!?" She screams. Looking up at her was her belly. Not her normal, flat belly she once knew, but a small round pot-belly. She lifted up her tight purple shirt to examin it. It wasn't huge, But it was very noticeable. Her sides had also grown a little. She looked at ehr relfection in a mirror. Not much seemed to have changed, except for her pot belly. She put her hands on it, and it growled. Hungry. "No. No more food for you today!" She said to it. What happens when they get there?

1231111112212112211.title: Dinner with Cody

choices: Its a delivery from her co workers, wishing her to get well soon!
Its Cody, with some food to cheer her up!
12311111122121122112.content:
Bailey woke up in the morning dead tired. She didn't have any energy at all. "Well, I guess thats what happens when ya don't eat anything more healthy than a cookie for 2 weeks." She thought. When she finaly reminded herself that she had to go to work, she reluctintly threw off the covers, only to reveal her pot belly, pushing out her nightshirt. Bailey groaned and fell back into her bed. She really didn't want to go to work today, and more importantly, she didn't think her figure could afford to. So 5 minuets and a very cough-filled phone call later, she was free for the day.

She still had to stay in her room of cource, she couldn't be seen walking about when she was supposedly sick. But what she COULD do was have her first healthy day in weeks. She would order healthy food, do some exorcise, and most importantly, stay away from all sweet temtations.

So she decided to start her day right, with a bowl of oatmeal. When it arrived, she made shure there were plenty of tisues around, to keep up the act. When she got it, she immidietly started eating, and almost gagged! After eating all sweets for weeks, the blandness of the oatmeal took her by suprise. But she ate it anyway. But to her suprise, when she was done, her belly growled! She was still hungery! She looked down at she stomach, and said firmly, "NO! Were gonna get back on a normal schedual, weather you like it or not!" Her belly seemed to rumble a sad note in responce. "Well TO BAD!" Bailey said, and started doing some jumping jacks. (Wich were kinda weird for her, as her new belly jiggled up and down with each one, makeing it kinda difficult to keep up.)

after only a minute, Bailey was already tired. "Phew. Harder than I thought!" Then she had an idea. "Hm. I better see how much I weigh so I can track my weight loss.
So she went to the bathroom and stepped on the scale. She looked down, and her belly was partialy placking the numbers. So she sucked in a bit and saw it land on 115.
"Well, that means I've gained 10 pounds. This shouldn't be too hard... I hope..." She said, feeling her belly.
Suddenly, theres a knock on the door. She quick hops into bed and puts on the most sick look she can muster, and says, "Come in!"

Who is it?

Speaking of which, she looked down at her gut. It had shrunk back down from its stuffed state, but was it just a bit bigger than before? She couldn't tell....

what does she do?

The food.

She looked over and the few donuts and the pie left, but she pushed the cart away with her foot, unable to eat any more.

About 2 hours later, she fell asleep again...
12311111122121122112111.title: Cave in!

choices: wakes up and finds a suprise at work...
123111111221211221121111.content:
Bailey awoke from her food-induced slumber some time later to a knocking sound at her door. As she came to her scences, she looked at her clock. "8:00 pm? Who could that be? Who would go knocking on a sick persons door at 8?"
She wondered. But all the same, she said, "Come in!"

The door opened, and Cody stepped in. "Hi Bailey. How are you feeling?" He asked. Bailey was confused for a few seconds, but then remembered she was supposed to be sick. "Oh, I'm feeling a lot better." She said. "Well, I brought you some dinner. I came to check on you a few times, but you were sleeping. So I thought you might be hungry." He said, holding up a large bag of Taco Bell. "I know you may not feel hungry, but you are sick, and now more than ever, you need your nourishment." He handed her the bag, which was heavier than she had thought. She opened it up, and took out what was certainly the largest burrito she had ever seen. It was cheesy, messy, heavy, and practically dripping with grease.

"Errrr... Cody, why'd ya bring me this pile of grease-soaked calories?" Bailey asked. "Well, It's an old family secret. If ya eat a whole 7 lb. burrito, it will cure even the worst cough. (yes, there are actually 7 lb burritos... Google them if ya want to see.)
"I don't know... I really do feel a lot better..." Bailey said, not even wanting to imagine what this would do to her stomach.
"No, your sick, and I'm not leavening until you eat every bite." Cody said.
"Uh... Ok... I guess..." Bailey said uncertainly, as she picked up one side of the burrito and took a bite. Her mouth filled with meat, cheese, lettuce, sour cream, and grease. It was delicious! She struggled to keep herself from going into an eating frenzy in front of Cody. She kept eating under his watchful eye, looking for an excuse to stop. She could feel her stomach pressing up against her pants, a reminder of why she should stop. But she couldn't. She didn't want anyone knowing that she had faked being sick!
And so she ate, little by little, the huge burrito...

An hour later...

"Good job Bailey. You ate the whole thing!" Cody said happily. He had just enjoyed watching his girlfriend stuff the 7 lb burrito into her growing stomach. "Uhhhg. *Belch*" Bailey replied. She had just suffered through 7 pounds of greasy burrito. Her mouth was smeared with cheese and grease, and her shirt, which now rode up to show the bottom of her rotund stomach, was stained in places with grease spots and bits of food. Bailey flopped from the sitting position to laying down in her bed, clutching her stuffed tummy with both hands. She gave another burp. " *Belch* Uhhg... My stomach..." She groaned. This was a truly monstrous meal. Cody noticed her discomfort, and said, "Does Bailey have a belly ach? Awww, poor thing. Do you want me to help?" Bailey nodded, and burped again. Cody got onto the bed, and rubbed her stomach, feeling its tightness loosen up under his fingers, until it was soft again. He could feel the food moving around under her stomach. He continued this for a few minuets, Bailey moaning and burping, until she said, "Ok, thanks *Urp* Cody." He stopped, and said, "You'll feel better tomorrow, don't worry." Then he turned off the lights and left...
123111111221211221121111.title: "Family secret"

what now?

"Unng.... *Belch* It might have to do with my stomach walls- *Belch* My docter said that they were unnaturaly thick or somthing... *urp*" They just sat there, Bailey just sitting there, Maya once again clutching her gut, for a few minuets, when Bailey said, "Well, we better be getting home. Getting late!"

Bailey scolded herself mentaly. I cant be feeling sorry for her, if my plan to make her eat, not me! If I ever want to be thin again, I'll have to be kinda heartless... But Bailey couldn't help but feel bad. Well, that is, until she was getting dressed for bed, and saw her big belly buldging over her pants. With that in mind, she went to bed...
12311111122121122112111111.title: Stuffing Maya

choices: Big Bite all you can eat buffet!
123111111221211221121111111.content:
It was 2 days later, and Bailey and Maya were just leaveing work, at 3:30. Chuck had reminded them often enough that because there contract said that they were paid by how much they ate, and didn't outline specific hours, they could really leave whenever they wanted. And today, Zach and Cody had asked them to a double date, a dinner. So after they both plowed few a couple of cakes a a pie each, they said goodbye and left the shop, stomachs stuffed, but not near the extent of what they were used to. Over the last few days, Bailey and Maya had grown to be good friends, and had both relaxed and had fun conversations while they were eating. This caused Bailey to eat more than she had planned, and when she had stepped on the scale this morning, she had winced when she saw the number on the scale rise to 128. Anouther 13 pounds! "Must have been that day off..." she had thought. Her belly had grown, now to a good sized pot-belly, looking as if she had swallowed a soccer ball, even when empty. Her sides had grown into small love handles, her butt had grown softer, and her thighs had a small layer of fat around them. Her breasts, the only thing she wouldn't have minded growing, had infuriatingly stayed pretty much the same.

She went to her room and immidietly began getting ready. Looking through her cloths, she saw that there was once more, nothing loose to wear. 1231111112212112211211112.content:
The next morning, Bailey woke up at around 9 a.m., which was decently early by her new standards, and was relieved to see that her stomach wasn't as big as it was when she stuffed herself the other night. But, it was still there. After weighing herself she found that she has gained another three pounds after her day of overindulgence in bed.

Bailey looked at herself in the mirror and sighed. She reflected upon her gluttonous actions ever since she first got her job at Sweetie's. Her first stuffing, where her new belly was too much for her large belt to handle. Her morning buffet on the sky deck. Her victory at the food-eating contest. And Cody, insisting that she keep on eating to ensure that there was more of her to love.

''Would I take it all back?'', Bailey asked herself. She certainly had her fair share of problems since her new job started, but all in all she had it pretty good. Her salary was great, she could make her own hours, her job was pretty easy, and best of all, Cody still loved her despite the added weight (disregarding the fact that the added weight was what made him love her more). Bailey undressed until she was in her bra and panties, and looked at herself in all of her glory.

Her butt was a little bit rounder, which Bailey actually didn't mind too much. She looked at it from the side and actually gave a bit of a smile as she gave it a bit of a rub. Her chest, on the other hand, barely grew at all, which irritated her. Upon finishing looking at the positive curves her body had to offer, she then sighed once more at the sight of her larger belly.

It stuck out significantly and sagged slightly under its own weight. Bailey guessed that it was around the size of a watermelon, but it certainly didn't feel like one. Upon poking it Bailey felt almost half of her finger sink into the layer of fat, and she could have sworn she had heard a quiet squishing sound accompany it. After poking it a few more times, she then took both hands and clutched her stomach with them. She was able to lift it up, and it was quite supple to the touch; as she let go her gut quickly bounced back into place. Finally, she gave her swollen belly two strong pats, which made it jiggle for about five seconds before subsiding.

Turning to her side again, Bailey decided to try to suck her stomach in. Her rounded midsection actually did manage to move itself all the way in, making Bailey look almost exactly like she did before this fiasco started. After seeing that, her final verdict was in.

''...maybe I can get used to this.''

She still wanted to restrain herself from gaining any more weight (for the sake of her health, among other things), but a little meat on her bones never hurt anyone. Maybe her mother was right. She looked at her gut and said,

''Okay you tub of lard, I'll keep you around. But get any bigger and I might have a heart attack, in more ways than one. So, I'll have to keep you under control. Sound fair?''

Her stomach growled upon finishing her sentence. Bailey couldn't help but giggle.

''I'll take that as a yes.''

She put on her work clothes and walked back to Sweetie's with a smile on her face, ready to start her new life.
1231111112212112211211112.title: Bailey gives in.

12311111122121122112111121.content:
Bailey arrived at her workplace and was greeted with open arms. Chuck was there to give her a little welcome-back present.

''Hey there, Bailey! Good to see you're feeling better! You look great!''

''Thanks, Chuck.'' Bailey replied. ''I'm ready to get back to business!''

''Well that's good, because I've got a surprise for you!''

From behind his back Chuck pulled out a bottle of what looked like Bailey's favorite Choco-Drink, but with a yellow star in the corner of the label.

''This is our newest recipe! We added a few things to give it some extra punch! Knowing how much you love the stuff, we wanted you to have a taste as soon as you got back!''

Bailey gleefully took the bottle and gave her boss a squishy hug.

''Thanks, Chuck!''

''No problem, Bailey. Just don't have too much of that at a time. Those are some big bottles.''

''I'll be fine. See you later!''

Chuck left the room, with Bailey sitting at her chair, with the bottle in her hand and her stomach calmly resting on her lap. With nothing left to do, Bailey took the bottle and rapidly chugged the contents down her throat.

She didn't know what it was, but this new recipe was even better than the last one! She could feel her stomach get tighter with each gulp, but she didn't care, it was just that good! After a couple of minutes she finished her bottle, and grabbed a second one without hesitating.

Ten minutes later, Bailey had finished her fifth bottle. She let out a moan and relaxed a little, trying to absorb what she had just done. Upon looking at her stomach she saw that it grew quite a bit after her chocolate-flavored free-for-all, and she couldn't even come close to seeing her feet anymore.

''Man, now I know what Chuck meant when he said that earlier.''

Bailey was about to fall asleep until something unexpected caught her attention.

*hiccup!*

Bailey jerked out of her seat and saw several chocolate bubbles floating in the air, before they each popped one by one.

''Whoa. Where did those- *HICCUP!*''

She soon saw that those bubbles came flying right out of her mouth. She quickly covered her mouth with both of her hands in embarrassment.

A few seconds passed, and Bailey slowly moved her hands from her mouth back to her swollen gut.

''Wow. I guess it really couldn't hold all of that in.'' Bailey chuckled as she started rubbing her stomach, and gave it one strong pat...

...which quickly triggered another hiccup.

143.content: Maya couldn't believe she was finally on an around-the-world cruise for the rest of high school! It was going to be amamzing she thought, and it was. She had to work at the smoothie bar to pay for her education/fare, but she didn't mind because Zack was the other employee. Their shifts only overlapped for an hour or so at one, but it was enough for her. Since becoming Zack's girlfriend, life had been relatively uneventful. About a month after coming on board, the smoothie bar got a new smoothie, "Creamy Coffee Cabana Cocktail" or C4. It was basically a grande cappucino with a cup of cream added and a few flavors like vanilla beans and cocoa. It quickly caught on, which was great because by law The Tipton could only serve smoothies made that day, and since they had to make the smoothies in batches of 20 gallons, there was usually about 10-15 gallons of perfectly good, but legally unsellable smoothie left over for Maya in the morning. She asked Mr. Mosby if it was O.K., and he replied "yes, yes, whatever. Have you seen London? She's been trying to escape the ship again and this time I saw her with an Ed Begley Jr. solar powered HeliJet." "How did..." Maya began "Don't ask. Lets just say that everyone important except me found a few thousand in their morning paper." was the response. While thinking about whether or not London was actually capable of procuring an Ed Begley Jr. Solar powered HeilJet, she tried some smoothie. Wow, that's amazing! she thought. Looking at the clock, Maya saw she had 20 minutes before the breakfast buffet ended and the pool area would begin to fill up. Since this smoothie is so good, and it'll help keep me awake with its caffeine, I think I could get used to it! And she did. She finished about 3 of the twelve gallons leftover from last night by ten o'clock, when the breakfast buffet ended. She saw Bailey walking out and offered her some complementary smoothie. "I can't take free smoothie from you!" she exclaimed "Mr. Mosby might find out and you'll be punished," However, when Maya explained that the smoothie was leftover, Bailey agreed to have some, and took to it immediately. For the next three hours, besides Maya working and Bailey doing a report, the two drank smoothies and chatted it up. Then at one Zack's shift started and Cody took Bailey to lunch (we all know they're probably getting back together at some point, there have been way too many hints, so I'm either being preemptive or refering to the past, whatever floats your boat). Maya and Zack started flirting a bit, they kissed, etc. At some point, Maya told Zack about the smoothie, and he asked if there was any left. There wasn't, Maya answered. "There's no way you drank a dozen gallons by yourself!" came Zack's incredulous reply, "are you just keeping it for yourself?" "No, you know I wouldn't keep anything from you sweetie, Bailey came by and drank a lot, she seemed really into it." At two, Maya's shift ended and she went.....
